scripts.pre-release: npm run build && mkdir -p chrome-to-roam && cp -R dist/* chrome-to-roam/ && zip -r chrome-to-roam.zip chrome-to-roam && rm -rf chrome-to-roam && echo 'Pre-release complete'
scripts.release:major: npm run pre-release && npm version major && git add chrome-to-roam.zip && git commit -m 'Build and dist update for major release' && git push origin main --tags && gh release create v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"') chrome-to-roam.zip --title 'Release v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')' --notes 'Major release v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')'
scripts.release:minor: npm run pre-release && npm version minor && git add chrome-to-roam.zip && git commit -m 'Build and dist update for minor release' && git push origin main --tags && gh release create v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"') chrome-to-roam.zip --title 'Release v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')' --notes 'Minor release v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')'
scripts.release:patch: npm run pre-release && npm version patch && git status && git add chrome-to-roam.zip && git commit -m 'Build and dist update for patch release' || true && git push origin main --tags || true && gh release create "v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" chrome-to-roam.zip --title "Release v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" --notes "Patch release v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" && echo 'Release process complete'
